questions.question: What is Artificial Intelligence?
questions.correct_answer: Artificial Intelligence is a branch of computer science that focuses on creating systems capable of performing tasks that require human intelligence.
questions.student_answer: Artificial Intelligence is a field of computer science that makes machines intelligent.

questions.question: Which algorithm guarantees the shortest path in an unweighted graph?
Explain Breadth First Search (BFS).
questions.correct_answer: Breadth First Search explores nodes level by level using a queue and guarantees the shortest path in an unweighted graph.
questions.student_answer: Breadth First Search is a graph traversal algorithm that explores nodes level by level using a queue.

questions.question: Explain Depth First Search (DFS) with advantages and disadvantages.
questions.correct_answer: Depth First Search explores nodes deeply before backtracking using a stack or recursion. It uses less memory but does not guarantee the shortest path.
questions.student_answer: Depth First Search goes deep into the graph using stack or recursion. It uses less memory but may not find the shortest path.
